product_overview: A comprehensive Interview Management Platform designed to facilitate and streamline the end-to-end recruitment interview process. It supports multiple types of interviews including audio/video and coding interviews, provides AI-driven feedback and performance analysis, and includes robust user authentication and management systems. The platform also offers institution-based course and batch management, credit handling, and administrative controls.
core_goals: Enable seamless user authentication for candidates, guests, and institutional users.
Provide a reliable and interactive system for conducting various types of interviews including audio/video and coding challenges.
Offer detailed, AI-powered interview performance analysis and feedback to help candidates improve.
Support institutions with course, batch, and interview scheduling management.
Maintain an intuitive dashboard and admin panel for different user roles for better control and overview.
Ensure credit management for controlling usage of interview resources.
key_features: Authentication & User Management: Multi-mode login, secure user authentication, and management for diverse user types including guests and institutions.
Interview System: Capability for audio/video interviews, data structure algorithm (DSA)/code interviews with real-time streaming and voice activity detection.
Interview Results & Analysis: AI-generated feedback, detailed insights visualized through custom UI components, specific handling for DSA and aptitude results.
Dashboard & Admin Panels: User dashboards, admin controls, and super-admin features for platform oversight and management.
Course & Batch Management: Tools for managing educational courses, user batches, and scheduling of institutional interviews.
UI Components & Utilities: Reusable React components, hooks and utility functions for consistent UI/UX throughout the platform.
Credit Management: System to manage and display user credits for using interview services.
user_flow_summary: User authentication flow: Login as registered user, guest, or institution user; handle session management and logout.
Interview initiation flow: Select interview type, schedule or start interview, perform interview using audio/video or coding interface with streaming and speech recognition.
Interview submission flow: Submit responses and await AI-generated analysis and feedback.
Results review flow: Access and navigate detailed interview results, performance insights and feedback UI.
Admin workflow: Admin and super-admin login, access dashboards, manage users, courses, batches, and monitor interviews.
Credit usage flow: Manage user credits, ensure sufficient credit before interview initiation, update credit usage post-interview.
validation_criteria: Successful user registration and authentication for all user types with expected security standards.
Stable, functional audio/video and coding interview execution with real-time streaming and speech processing.
Accurate and useful AI-generated interview feedback and detailed insights accessible through the user interface.
Fully operational dashboards and administrative controls with access restrictions enforced.
Effective management of courses, batches, and interview scheduling with no data inconsistency.
Proper recording and deduction of user credits aligned with interview usage.
Responsive UI components functioning correctly across devices and browsers.
